head.title: Seen at Fine Tables: Handsome and Sturdy Sons of Measuring Cup

hedline.hl1: Seen at Fine Tables: Handsome and Sturdy Sons of Measuring Cup

block.p: Just because it's beautiful doesn't mean it isn't smart. The new Musica line (below) from Armani Casa is made of hand-crafted Pyrex (like measuring cups) so it won't crack when you pour hot liquids into it. (Pyrex is also easy to clean and does not stain.) The pitcher is $195, the bowl $38. A glass and a tumbler, not shown, are $35 each. Available at month's end at Armani Casa stores, 97 Greene Street (Spring Street), (212) 334-1271; and 157 North Robertson Boulevard, Los Angeles, (310) 248-2440.
